title: La picara, or, The triumphs of female subtilty display'd in the artifices and impostures of a beautiful woman, who trapann'd the most experienc'd rogues, and made all those unhappy who thought her handsome : originally a Spanish relation, enriched with three pleasant novels / render'd into English with some alterations and additions by John Davies ...
author: Castillo Solórzano, Alonso de, 1584-1648?
publisher: Printed by W.W. for John Starkey ...,
notes: From a French version of: Garduña de Sevilla / Alonso de Castillo Solórzano. Cf. BM.
A second part, mentioned at end, never published.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
